entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Bernières
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:23 p.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sainte-Foy - Laval University 12:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
Temperature: -3.5°C
Humidity: 52 %
Dewpoint: -12.0°C
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow or ice pellets. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning late in the morning then changing to ice pellets late in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to freezing rain in the evening. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
